mutants.code:
import math

def growth_rate(A, P, t):
    r = math.log(A / P) * t
    return r

import math

def growth_rate(A, P, t):
    r = math.log(A / P) // t
    return r

import math

def growth_rate(A, P, t):
    r = math.log(A * P) / t
    return r

import math

def growth_rate(A, P, t):
    r = math.log(A // P) / t
    return r
